channel.title: Comments on: REVIEW: M.I.A., Kala, XL

item.title: By: M.I.A. on The Late Show with David Letterman 09.13.2007, Drawer B
item.dc:creator: M.I.A. on The Late Show with David Letterman 09.13.2007, Drawer B
item.description: [...] tones it way down for national TV, performing one of maybe two songs from her new record, Kala, that would even be remotely suitable in this context. The sampled gunshots are replaced with muted [...]
